docs.lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, Nov. 2 -- The Congress of Industrial Organizations demanded today the scrapping of the "Little Steel" formula and the substitution of labor's version of the proper basis for national wage stabilization.

headline.main: CIO DEMANDS END OF STEEL FORMULA; Murray Says Alternative Is Local Strikes and Stoppages Despite Union Pledge BACK MINE AND RAIL MEN Resolutions Call Wage Request Just -- Roosevelt and WLB Assailed

docs.snippet: PHILADELPHIA, Nov. 2 -- The Congress of Industrial Organizations demanded today the scrapping of the "Little Steel" formula and the substitution of labor's version of the proper basis for national wage stabilization.

byline.original: By WALTER W. RUCHSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
